import React, {Component} from "react"; import moment from 'moment'; import axios from "axios"; import iconwind from "../assets/images/icon-wind.png" class InfoGeneral extends Component{ state = { informacionTotal: [], informacionPrincipal: [], informacionClima: [], informacionViento: [] } componentDidMount(){ axios.get('http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=Medellin&lang=sp&units=metric&appid=f0e5a162320155ed3912e1cbaa66d4b2') .then((response)=>{ this.setState({informacionTotal: response.data}) this.setState({informacionPrincipal: response.data.main}) this.setState({informacionClima: response.data.weather[0]}) this.setState({informacionViento: response.data.wind}) }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }) } render(){ moment.defineLocale('fakeLocale', {parentLocale:'es-mx'}); var urlClimaActual = "http://openweathermap.org/img/wn/"+this.state.informacionClima.icon+"@2x.png"; return (
{moment().format('dddd')}
{moment().format("DD/MMM/YY h:mm:ss a")}
Medellin
{this.state.informacionClima.description}
{this.state.informacionPrincipal.temp}oC
{this.state.informacionViento.speed} Km/h
Hoy
{this.state.informacionPrincipal.temp_max} oC
{this.state.informacionPrincipal.temp_min} oC
Wednesday
23oC
18o
Thursday
23oC
18o
Friday
23oC
18o
Saturday
23oC
18o
Sunday
23oC
18o
); } } export default InfoGeneral;
